mapper.sql: id, name, address, description, logo, order_no, reg_time, ts, tag, fee, noitice, level, status
mapper.select:
select school_order.numberOfAppli,
from tb_school left join (select school_id,count(id) numberOfAppli from tb_school_order group by school_id) school_order on tb_school.id=school_order.school_id order by fee+0;

select school_order.numberOfAppli,
from tb_school left join (select school_id,count(id) numberOfAppli from tb_school_order group by school_id) school_order on tb_school.id=school_order.school_id order by school_order.numberOfAppli desc;

select school_order.numberOfAppli,
from (select tb_school.* from tb_school WHERE tb_school.name LIKE concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) school_name left join (select school_id,count(id) numberOfAppli from tb_school_order group by school_id) school_order on school_name.id=school_order.school_id order by school_name.fee desc;
